title: A Kingdom Divided
subtitle: The Call to Arms
description: The border villages burn as undead hordes pour across the frontier. Rally the scattered defenders and hold the line while messengers ride to the capital.

story.synopsis: Undead forces have breached the northern frontier. As a young commander, you must organize the defense of Thornwall Keep while seeking reinforcements from the capital.
story.openingNarration: The night sky glows red with burning villages. The dead walk again, and the border garrisons fall one by one. At Thornwall Keep, Commander Aldric receives grim news - he must hold the line with whatever forces remain.
story.closingNarration: The reinforcements have arrived, but at great cost. The northern frontier lies in ruins, yet Thornwall still stands. The kingdom awakens to the threat, but darker days lie ahead.
story.timeframe: Early Spring, Year 1 of the Reckoning
